name: markdownlint
description: A Node.js style checker and lint tool for Markdown/CommonMark files.
author: David Anson (https://dlaa.me/)

scripts.build-config: npm run build-config-schema && npm run build-config-example
scripts.build-declaration: tsc --allowJs --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --module commonjs --outDir dts --resolveJsonModule --target es2015 lib/markdownlint.js && node scripts copy dts/lib/markdownlint.d.ts lib/markdownlint.d.ts && node scripts remove dts
scripts.build-demo: node scripts copy node_modules/markdown-it/dist/markdown-it.min.js demo/markdown-it.min.js && node scripts copy node_modules/markdownlint-micromark/micromark-browser.js demo/micromark-browser.js && node scripts copy node_modules/markdownlint-micromark/micromark-html-browser.js demo/micromark-html-browser.js && cd demo && webpack --no-stats
scripts.build-example: npm install --no-save --ignore-scripts grunt grunt-cli gulp through2
scripts.ci: npm-run-all --continue-on-error --parallel lint serial-config-docs serial-declaration-demo test-cover && git diff --exit-code
scripts.clone-test-repos-apache-airflow: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/apache/airflow apache-airflow --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-dotnet-docs: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/dotnet/docs dotnet-docs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-electron-electron: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/electron/electron electron-electron --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet && cd electron-electron && npm install --ignore-scripts @electron/lint-roller typescript@4
scripts.clone-test-repos-eslint-eslint: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/eslint/eslint eslint-eslint --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-mdn-content: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/mdn/content mdn-content --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-mkdocs-mkdocs: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/mkdocs/mkdocs mkdocs-mkdocs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-mochajs-mocha: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/mochajs/mocha mochajs-mocha --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-pi-hole-docs: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/pi-hole/docs pi-hole-docs --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-v8-v8-dev: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/v8/v8.dev v8-v8-dev --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-webhintio-hint: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/webhintio/hint webhintio-hint --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos-webpack-webpack-js-org: cd test-repos && git clone https://github.com/webpack/webpack.js.org webpack-webpack-js-org --depth 1 --no-tags --quiet
scripts.clone-test-repos: mkdir test-repos && cd test-repos && npm run clone-test-repos-apache-airflow && npm run clone-test-repos-dotnet-docs && npm run clone-test-repos-electron-electron && npm run clone-test-repos-eslint-eslint && npm run clone-test-repos-mdn-content && npm run clone-test-repos-mkdocs-mkdocs && npm run clone-test-repos-mochajs-mocha && npm run clone-test-repos-pi-hole-docs && npm run clone-test-repos-v8-v8-dev && npm run clone-test-repos-webhintio-hint && npm run clone-test-repos-webpack-webpack-js-org
scripts.declaration: npm run build-declaration && npm run test-declaration
scripts.example: cd example && node standalone.js && grunt markdownlint --force && gulp markdownlint
scripts.docker-npm-install: docker run --rm --tty --name npm-install --volume $PWD:/home/workdir --workdir /home/workdir --user node node:latest npm install
scripts.docker-npm-run-upgrade: docker run --rm --tty --name npm-run-upgrade --volume $PWD:/home/workdir --workdir /home/workdir --user node node:latest npm run upgrade
scripts.serial-config-docs: npm run build-config && npm run build-docs
scripts.serial-declaration-demo: npm run build-declaration && npm-run-all --continue-on-error --parallel build-demo test-declaration
scripts.test: ava --timeout=30s test/markdownlint-test.js test/markdownlint-test-config.js test/markdownlint-test-custom-rules.js test/markdownlint-test-helpers.js test/markdownlint-test-micromark.mjs test/markdownlint-test-result-object.js test/markdownlint-test-scenarios.js
scripts.test-declaration: cd example/typescript && tsc --module nodenext && tsc --module commonjs && node type-check.js
